mdRecord.dcterms:description: In this touching letter, written 27 days after the Mexican-American War had ended, Lee writes to his daughter Annie Carter from his temporary quarters at his post in Mexico City.
The available files include a transcript and image files for each page, created by scanning the original document.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Cats -- Anecdotes
